p: One gram of a poultry tissue was transferred into a polypropylene (PP) centrifuge tube and 4 mL of MeOH was added while shaking using a vortex mixer. Subsequently, the tube was shaken for 15 min on a rotary tumbler. After centrifugation (3,600 g, 15 min), the upper layer was isolated by decanting it into a PP centrifuge tube and acidified by adding 20 μL of FA prior to the tandem solid-phase extraction (SPE) procedure (Fig. 2a).
